com.datamelt.util

Class RowField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.util.RowField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RowField
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    the RowField class represents a field defined by a name and its value (in form of an object).
    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      static long serialVersionUID 
      private boolean updated 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RowField(java.lang.Object name)
      constructor that takes the name of the field as argument. because no object/value is specified, the object/value is set to null
      RowField(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object object)
      constructor that takes the name and an object/value of the field as arguments.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.String getName()
      gets the name of the field
